# The `VPWidenPHIRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A recipe for handling phis that are widened in the vector loop. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A recipe for handling phis that are widened in the vector loop.

In the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> native path, all incoming VPValues &amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpbasicblock">VPBasicBlock</a> pairs are managed in the recipe directly.

Definition at line 2306 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.
